text:
Biden says there’s nothing he can do about record gas or food prices.

The White House says “the economy is in a better place than it has been historically.”

Two opposite messages.

One incompetent administration. https://t.co/7r03dFSELg https://t.co/e4NUhpCoSA

Instead of actually working to solve our #BorderCrisis a year ago, Border Czar Kamala Harris did nothing but say "do not come."

Predictably, no one listened.

Now, thousands of migrants are rapidly approaching our southern border demanding entry.
https://t.co/q8jo1Ekzvs

78 years ago, the Greatest Generation stormed the beaches of Normandy, fought for freedom, and changed history forever.

Let us never forget their courage, bravery, and sacrifice!

A Missouri front page from #DDay in 1944: https://t.co/q2q6iKyoWq

Taking away Americans' #2A rights is the wrong approach to protect our schoolchildren.

Instead, Congress should be working to empower our law enforcement to protect our education centers and provide our schools with the resources needed to increase security. https://t.co/9VQO8JK2I7

For months, Republicans sounded the alarm that Biden’s disastrous agenda would cause prices to soar for American families.

Biden did nothing about it. https://t.co/kBhPjs3dj6
